name: Jefto - Project Management Tool
description: _A project management tool to help you manage your projects. Includes features like task management, time tracking, and workspace management.

name: TCN - SaaS Starter Kit
description: _A SaaS starter kit, built with Turborepo, Convex, Next.js, Polar, Resend, Shadcn UI, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

name: Finvista - Budget Tracker
description: _A budget tracker, that can help you manage your budget more efficiently.

name: FFVideo - Video Compressor
description: _A tool that can help you compress your videos more efficiently. Built with FFmpeg, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

name: Debux - Error Reporter
description: _A tool that can help you report, track, and debug errors more efficiently.
